definition: Osmunda regalis, a species of fern/Taiwan pr. [wei2]
grass radical 草字頭兒|草字头儿[cao3 zi4 tou2 r5]
surname Wei/ancient Chinese state near present day Chongqing/Taiwan pr. [Wei2]
Zhao Wei or Vicky Zhao (1976-), Chinese film star
Hu Ziwei (1970-), PRC lady TV presenter
see 安妮·海瑟薇[An1 ni2 · Hai3 se4 wei1]

sentences.english: That was Hedwig. She brought a letter from Lupin .
sentences.chinese: 是海德薇，她帶來了一封盧平的信。

sentences.english: Welcome to Da Ai Headlines. I'm Leeway Cai. Thank you for joining us.
sentences.chinese: 歡迎收看大愛英語新聞，我是蔡力薇，感恩您的加入。

sentences.english: "This is where the story starts, " Ms. Lovell said.
sentences.chinese: 羅薇爾女士說，“這就是故事開始的地方。”

sentences.english: At a party in Paris after Violetta's return.

sentences.english: Violetta is deeply moved and returns the affection.

sentences.english: Zhao revealed in an interview it was the first official post she had ever gained.
sentences.chinese: 趙薇在接受採訪時稱這也是她自小到大第一次當官。

sentences.english: Valerie's parents nixed her plans to travel to Europe alone.
sentences.chinese: 薇洛莉的父母不同意她獨自遊歐的計畫。

sentences.english: Lady Walda gave a shriek and clutched at her lord husband's arm.

sentences.english: Osmund chamomile has spread in Nansha zone, more attention would be paid to.

definition: (phonetic na)/used esp. in female names such as Anna 安娜[An1 na4] or Diana 黛安娜[Dai4 an1 na4]
